Title

pkpdPredPlot.Rd

Plots PK-PD predictions based on qP's suite of PK and Effect Model functions

pkpdPredPlot(doses, t.doses, t.obs, pk.func, e.func, parms, output = FALSE)

Arguments

doses

numeric vector of doses
t.doses

numeric vector of time of doses (equal length of doses)
t.obs

time opf observations
pk.func

pharmacokinetic function to evaluate. See pk.pred
e.func

effect model function to evaluate. See pk.pred
parms

numeric vector (may be a named vector but is not required)
output

if TRUE the simulation input and outpout is returned as list. If FALSE (default) the plot is created.

Value

A plot or a list with output

Details

PK-PD superposition of multiple doses

Examples

eff.1comp.iv(dose = 100, tob = seq(0,24*7), parms = c(1,10, 0.25))
